name: Prothom-alo.com cleaner & beautifier
description:
[+] removes ads on www.prothom-alo.com and eprothomalo.com
[+] works for both left & right side ads (screenshot shows only left side)
[+] removes "ShareThis", "twitter", "facebook" buttons, keeps "Print" & "Comment" buttons
[+] removes stock exchnge ticker
[+] changes the background of detail version of a news from bright white to off-white to increase readability
[+] removes almost useless prothom-alo search, it never worked for me.
[+] removes recently added prothom-alo jobs ads.
[+] removes asian-city online poll ad.
[+] removes beta tag.
[+] removes distracting "TAJA-KHOBOR" marquee from top
[+] fixes image-tags from overlapping onto the bottom of the images in prothom-alo album.
[+] removes 2 left-over divider bar from underneath editor's picture.
[+] removes swapnershiri.com (and likewise) ads.
[+] removes new FaceBook box (underneath "Prothom-alo Shruti")
[+] removes "Prothom-alo Shruti" as it quite useless at the moment.
[+] removes "Twitter follow".
